FuncDef:
The user-queue command creates a user queue profile and displays its view.
The undo user-queue command deletes a user queue profile and exits its view.
By default, no user queue profile is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a user queue profile.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A user queue profile is used to configure parameters such as a scheduling mode, scheduling priority, scheduling weight, and shaping value for a user queue scheduler. This profile can be referenced by different QoS profiles so that different user queue schedulers perform differentiated QoS processing for service traffic. This improves HQoS configuration efficiency.
You must create a user queue profile before configuring parameters for it.
Precautions
Currently, a user queue profile can be bound only to a QoS profile in enhanced 8-CoS mode.
